Name: Dr. C.N. Ashwath Narayan
Tweet: Karma has its own way of working!  The collapse of a bridge in ISRO colony speaks volume about @siddaramaiah govt's development track record in past 5 yrs.   ''Delivered as Promised'', Mr. CM? Definitely not!  #BJP4BetterKarnataka #KarnatakaElection2018   https://t.co/z9euEEZkgi
